triples.name: Speech synthesis
triples.relevance: FastPitch is a speech synthesis model that generates speech from text input.

triples.name: Deep learning speech synthesis
triples.relevance: FastPitch builds on deep learning approaches to text-to-speech synthesis, extending FastSpeech with pitch prediction.

triples.name: Transformer (deep learning)
triples.relevance: FastPitch uses a fully-parallel Transformer architecture to enable efficient speech synthesis.

triples.name: Spectrogram
triples.relevance: FastPitch synthesizes mel-spectrograms as an intermediate representation for speech generation.

triples.name: Fundamental frequency
triples.relevance: FastPitch conditions on and predicts fundamental frequency contours to control pitch in synthesized speech.

triples.name: Neural network architecture
triples.relevance: FastPitch proposes a novel fully-parallel text-to-speech architecture that predicts pitch contours alongside mel-spectrograms.
